Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'In the long history of battling the Punishing Virus, humans often forget that the virus is not their only enemy.'}
{3: 'Natural disasters like tsunamis, earthquakes, avalanches, and volcanic eruptions can easily claim countless lives.'}
{3: "Humans always believe they've conquered nature, only to scatter and flee in the face of its power."}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory731.jpg'}
{3: 'The camp is in chaos due to the approaching desert storm, and everyone is anxious about the impending disaster.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Male Civilian', 3: "I-I want to go back. The storm won't reach us for another hour. We can still make it...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Female Civilian', 3: "Go back where? The only conservation area nearby is 148 and we've just raided it. I'd rather stay and take my chances than be strung up and beaten.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Male Civilian', 3: "Take your chances? Don't you see we have nothing but tents in this camp? We will die if we stay here!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Female Civilian', 3: "Then go back alone! We won't stop you. Just don't take our car!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Male Civilian', 3: 'Why are you yelling? Is the car yours? Everything here is stolen!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Female Civilian', 3: "So what if it's stolen? You're a thief too!", 4: '2'}
{3: "Terrified civilians start arguing fiercely. Amid the uproar, there's a shout."}
{2: '??', 3: "What's the point of arguing? Whoever grabs the car keys first owns it. I'm going for the car. Who's with me?"}
{2: 'Civilians', 3: 'Me! Me!'}
{3: 'The shout stirs up a frenzy. The fragile balance shatters at the mention of fighting for the car.'}
{3: 'People begin pushing and shoving violently. Those for and against taking the car by force start fighting, filling the air with curses.'}
{3: 'Seeing a brawl is about to start, you and Watanabe exchange a glance.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Refugee?', 3: '【kuroname】, this is our chance.', 4: '1'}
{3: "You nod, knowing Watanabe is referring to the opportunity you'd discussed earlier—to persuade them to surrender without a fight."}
{3: 'Just as you are about to stop the chaos, a sharp gunshot sounds, causing everyone to scream in fright and crouch down.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Schneider', 3: "Shut up, you idiots. Did you really think I'd let you take my stuff and just walk away?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Schneider', 3: "If you weren't so stupid, I might have considered taking a few of you with me. But now I realize that none of you are worth saving.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Schneider', 3: "It's a pity to lose people here, but there are plenty of useful idiots like you in other conservation areas. I'm leaving. You can stay here and die in this damned desert!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'With those words, Schneider, holding his pistol high, turns to flee toward the garage, guarded by his soldiers.'}
{2: "—He's getting away!", 3: '43'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I'll stop him!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Watanabe tears off the cloak that is restricting his movements and dashes after Schneider like a black whirlwind.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: "Schneider's soldiers try to block him, but Watanabe dodges them in a breeze and knocks them out before they can react."}
{3: "In the blink of an eye, only three or four of Schneider's soldiers are left standing."}
{3: "The civilians, now aware of Schneider's betrayal, rush to block the path to the garage."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Schneider', 3: "You... you're the Forsaken traitor, Watanabe!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'You have no right to call me a traitor.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Seeing his escape route blocked, Schneider points his gun at you in desperation.'}
{2: 'Schneider', 3: "Don't move! I saw you talking with that person. Come any closer and I'll shoot!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'I dare you.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Watanabe takes a step forward with an expressionless face.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I'm faster than you. I will break your wrist before you can pull that trigger.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Say... you don't think you're faster than a Construct, do you?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Schneider', 3: 'D-damn it... Ahhh—!', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Schneider tries to pull the trigger in desperation. Right then, both you and Watanabe lunge forward.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'Another deafening gunshot echoes through the small mess hall.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'People open their eyes cautiously, expecting to see a bloodbath, but all they see is a bullet hitting the ceiling. Watanabe has taken down Schneider before he could fire.'}
{3: "Watanabe quickly turns to check on you. You wave at him to show that you're fine."}
{2: "I'm fine. Let's check on Schneider.", 3: '81'}
{3: 'The two of you walk over to Schneider and find him unconscious on the ground.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Good. Saved us some trouble. Let's take him to the conservation area for trial.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Watanabe ties up the unconscious Schneider. Only then do the civilians realize what has happened.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Male Civilian', 3: 'W-wait, is he...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Female Civilian', 3: "That's right! He's Watanabe, leader of the Forsaken. How did we not recognize him earlier?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'All', 3: 'Oh my... Watanabe!!'}
{3: 'The civilians gasp, their admiration for Watanabe quickly turning to fear.'}
{3: "This is understandable. Even though Schneider has just betrayed them, it doesn't erase their long-standing hostility toward the Forsaken. To them, Watanabe is still an enemy."}
{1: '1', 3: "You raise your hand, signaling for everyone's attention."}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: 'Everyone, please listen to me.', 3: '99'}
{2: 'Some of you may have recognized that I am the Gray Raven Commandant from Babylonia.', 3: '100'}
{2: 'Today, Watanabe and I are here to assist you in your evacuation back to the conservation area...', 3: '101'}
{2: 'Where you will be treated fairly and not face any so-called "vigilante justice."', 3: '102'}
{3: 'Your speech seems to ease some apprehension, but the crowd remains skeptical.'}
{2: 'Female Civilian', 3: "You're the Gray Raven Commandant. I recognize you...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Female Civilian', 3: 'But words are just words. What if you go back on your promise?', 4: '2'}
{3: "The woman voices the crowd's concern, and they all agree."}
{2: 'All', 3: "Right! We've done many terrible things. People in the conservation area might not want to take us in."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Just because you've done bad things in the past, does that mean you have to continue living like this?", 4: '1'}
{3: "Watanabe's thought-provoking question interrupts the murmur."}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "It's like saying you have to keep making mistakes simply because you've made one to begin with.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "If you keep running away from the consequences of your past actions, you'll never get back on the right path.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Do you really want to spend the rest of your lives hiding, barely filling your stomach through theft and robbery?', 4: '1'}
{3: "The crowd falls silent, unable to answer Watanabe's questions."}
{3: 'Of course, they all long for the day they can return to a peaceful life. Many of them have already seen through Schneider\'s trap and lost hope in the "Resisters".'}
{3: "But still, none of them ever found the courage to face the mistakes they have made, all while knowing full well that they couldn't realistically hide forever."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Resister Soldier', 3: "...Hey, I've got something to say.", 4: '1'}
{3: "One of the soldiers who hasn't been knocked out by Watanabe raises his hand. You recognize him as the man who gave you cookies."}
{2: 'Resister Soldier', 3: 'I was the one who let them in. I knew from day one that they didn\'t agree with the idea of "Resisters", but I chose not to bust them.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Resister Soldier', 3: "Because when we met, I remembered that I didn't come here to do this kind of dirty work. I came just for the food but somehow ended up as one of Schneider's henchmen.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The soldier casts a glance at Watanabe and puts down his weapon.'}
{2: 'Resister Soldier', 3: "Watanabe, Gray Raven Commandant, I'm going with the two of you. I want to try a new path.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The soldier goes to stand beside Watanabe. Seeing this, the other civilians start to murmur among themselves.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Anyone else want to come with us?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'This Forsaken rescue mission will not leave anyone behind, as long as you believe in us.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: 'The conservation area will not reject anyone who needs protection.', 3: '132'}
{2: 'We are here to help each other, not to fight against one another.', 3: '133'}
{3: "This time, the silence doesn't last long."}
{3: "The soldier's actions acted as a catalyst, pushing the crowd toward the right path."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Female Civilian', 3: "I-I'll go with you. I don't want to die here!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Male Civilian', 3: "I'd rather be in jail than become a mummy here!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'All', 3: "Me too! I've had enough of this life. Let's go back!"}
{3: 'The voices grow louder and more determined, eventually merging into a clear chant.'}
{2: 'All', 3: 'Watanabe, Gray Raven Commandant, we want to go with you.', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{3: 'Watanabe raises his right arm, making sure everyone can see his signal.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Everyone, follow me. We're leaving!", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory139.png'}
{3: "By the time the Forsaken receives the emergency call and arrives, the sandstorm is already dangerously close to the camp's center. Moving through the swirling sand is incredibly difficult."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Skinny Recruit', 3: 'Commander, all twenty armored vehicles are in position. Please give further instructions!', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Good. Help the civilians evacuate the camp, prioritizing the elderly, women, and children. Once a vehicle is full, send it off immediately.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "No matter what happens, don't look back. Drive straight toward the conservation area. If you stop, the sandstorm will catch up.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Skinny Recruit', 3: 'Yes, Commander!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "【kuroname】, please help maintain order. Someone might try to cut in line. We can't afford any delays.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Wait, take this.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Watanabe pulls out a pistol from his coat, unlocks the safety, and hands it to you.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I know you don't want to hurt anyone, but now they know who you are. Some people might be hostile toward you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: '【kuroname】, take care of yourself.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I'll stay here and leave with the last vehicle, but the sandstorm might not give us that much time. If you have the chance, go ahead without me.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: "That's not going to happen.", 3: '169'}
{2: "Like I said, I won't put myself in any danger.", 3: '170'}
{2: 'So let me complete this mission with you.', 3: '171'}
{3: "You hold firmly onto Watanabe's wrist."}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "...Alright. I'll be waiting for you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Come back as soon as possible.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'You nod and rush into the swirling sandstorm.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySandNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'Every step in the storm is incredibly difficult. Your legs feel as though they were filled with lead, sinking into the quicksand.'}
{3: 'It feels like the entire desert has a will of its own, dragging its prey into the abyss.'}
{2: 'Just a little longer...', 3: '186'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryHuiyisha01.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory338.jpg'}
{3: 'One armored vehicle after another rushes away, accelerating to escape the vortex of death.'}
{2: 'Just a bit more...', 3: '192'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory319.png'}
{3: 'The sunlight grows dimmer, making it almost impossible to see where they are.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory31.jpg'}
{3: 'The last armored vehicle finally leaves, and you start heading to the rendezvous point with Watanabe.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryHuiyisha01.prefab'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'But the last bit of sunlight is already completely obscured by the sandstorm, leaving you lost in the desert.'}
{2: 'Right, the transmitter...', 3: '207'}
{3: 'You struggle to take the transmitter out from your coat.'}
{3: 'The dim screen is flickering faintly with the words: "No Signal".'}
{2: '(Discard heavy items)', 3: '212'}
{3: 'You drop the empty canteen and the useless transmitter, but your steps are still heavy.'}
{2: '(Discard a few more heavy items)', 3: '215'}
{3: 'You then throw away the useless combat knife.'}
{2: "(It's still heavy)", 3: '217'}
{3: 'You look through your belongings again, but there is nothing else to discard.'}
{3: 'You pull on the cloak tighter to keep the sand out.'}
{3: 'But your steps grow heavier, each one sinking deeper into the quicksand despite your effort to take larger strides.'}
{2: "I'm going to fall...", 3: '221'}
{3: 'Just as your body is about to sink into the quicksand, a force pulls you up.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStorySugorokuScreen01.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory139.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I've got you, 【kuroname】! The vehicle is almost here. Hang in there!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Watanabe stands in the sinking quicksand, using all his strength to pull you out of the deadly whirlpool.'}
{2: "(Grab Watanabe's arm)", 3: '230'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "See that white vehicle by the camp gate? Don't give up now. We're almost there!", 4: '1'}
{2: '(Takes a step forward)', 3: '234'}
{3: 'With stamina depleting, every step grows tougher, but Watanabe holds onto you firmly, preventing the quicksand from devouring your body.'}
{3: 'Supported by this unwavering strength, you finally arrive at the vehicle.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "We're here!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStorySugorokuScreen01.prefab'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySandNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory139.png'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory821.png', 3: '1', 4: '1', 5: '0'}
{3: 'Watanabe pushes you into the vehicle, slamming the door shut, separating you from the raging storm.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Good job. All civilians have been evacuated. Let's go.", 4: '1'}
{3: "The armored vehicle smoothly drives out of the storm's center, leaving the small camp far behind."}
{3: 'Moments after the vehicle departs, the camp is swallowed by the rolling sands.'}
{3: 'The expressions of the civilians in the back seats show lingering fear.'}
{3: 'This is the desert, nature in its most primal and terrifying form.'}
